description: Germany pours money into the arts as cultural life takes a battering from coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Thrifty Germany takes on debt to rescue arts
title_page: Coronavirus: Thrifty Germany takes on debt to rescue arts - BBC News
maintext: In the summer garden, reunited with their fellow singers, the rock and roll choir tries not to think about the autumn. For now, while the sun shines, L¨¹beck's artists and performers are doing what they can.
